modName: Full Body Wrap Around Dragon Tattoo for CBBE Females
summary: THIS IS NOT A COPYPASTA! This is origonal dragon tattoo artwork made by me.
descriptionHtml:
THIS IS NOT A COPYPASTA! I cant stress that enough. I got sick of other tattoos of logos and designs copied from Google images onto the skins. It doesn\'t look good to have a perfect tattoo IMO. Especially if its a \'Skyrim\' logo. I decided to make my own tattoo. 

This took me forever to make because this tattoo wraps around the body. Lining up the tattoo front to back over and over is really tough, especially if parts of the body stretch and pinch. I\'m horrible at 3D programs so i did it the hard way, make the skin and view it in Skyrim, take notes, then edit again. this took me a lot of hours and a lot of patience. However, I loved the process and don\'t regret it. I made this for myself but I hope you can enjoy it as well. I do appreciate constructive critizism so if you have any thoughts, good or bad let me know, just dont be too rough. Thanks.

Requirements:
Works with all CBBE mods. Just a Texture replacer.

If you replace on your regular race character, all of that race will have the same tattoo, not cool, you need to get the custom race mod http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8720 and place it in the CustomNord or CustomHighElf or wherever. Not accessible with Orc, Cats, or Lizards. Sadface.

Big thanks to CBBE
Which you can get here! http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

And works with the cool Killer Keos Skimpy Armors here! http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3654

BTW, check out MGS Snake Eater Face Paints http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12145
author: Shwangk
